## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 35,000                                   |
| Rationale                         | Ordering 35,000 units ensures sufficient stock for the next 5 days considering demand variability and covers the minimum order quantity for the discount, while still maximizing inventory turnover. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     |  5,000 units lower than the player's plan.  |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 6.1 days                                  |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5.8 days                                  |
| Comments                          | This recommendation takes into account the current stock level and the forecasted demand. It also considers the minimum order quantity for the discount and the lead time to ensure timely replenishment. By ordering in multiples of the vendor's available order quantities, we can maximize efficiency and minimize waste.  |
